name: consumers
description: The Consumer object represents a consumer - or a user - of an API

fields.name: username
fields.help: The unique username of the consumer. You must send either this field or custom_id with the request.

fields.name: custom_id
fields.help: Field for storing an existing unique ID for the consumer - useful for mapping Kong with users in your existing database. You must send either this field or username with the request.

fields.name: tags
fields.help: An optional set of strings associated with the Consumer, for grouping and filtering.
